page.title: 09TRANSPORT,MARLEY HILL AREA
page.content: There are two main roads in the{Marley {Hill Area.}The{A692 Gateshead-Consett and the{A6076 Sunniside-Lanchester. } There are several minor roads:-Coppy Lane,Hedley Lane,Birkland Lane,Beamish Burn Road and Birkhead Lane which is very busy in the morning and evening rush hour. 19.7.1985{Traffic Census}08.30-12.30 {A692--------------------------------- Cars Lorries Vans Buses Others 1152 126 226 55 36 {A6076--------------------------------- 874 187 208 38 13 Both main roads carried a large amount of commuter traffic between 08.30 and 09.00.Many people in the area own cars There is an adequate public bus service.Within the Tyne-Wear Area children have unlimited travel for 5p and Old Age Pensioners travel free at off-peak times.
